title: client connection error (outside the game)
body:
so im on the client and every half a minute or so i receive "connection timeout: the request to the PVP.net server timed out".

some times when i leave the game the stats are not showing (probably cant receive info from server).
this has nothing to do with the game itself. in game i have the same 80 ping i normally have. and no new lags. this is strictly a client issue.
it happens in the new and old client. so switching wont help. this started the previous patch but stayed in this one. i did the client repair but to no avail.

replies.body:
Thanks for letting me know the error message you're seeing! When you see this message, it's a good sign that your network is having some connection issues with our game server. Let's go through this [Connections Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to find the source of the problem.

Hit me up if you're still having issues after that.
